dcterms:creator: B. Balaji
J. Bright
H. Prakash
Y. Chen
D. A. Clausi
J. Zelek
dcterms:description: The SoccerNet player recognition dataset is the largest open source jersey number dataset in the world, comprising a total of 4,064 player tracklets. Each tracklet is predominantly focused on one player, and the label for the entire tracklet is the jersey number of that particular player. The dataset has been partitioned into four distinct subsets: training, validation, testing, and challenge sets.
dcterms:title: SoccerNet Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Bright
Y. Chen
J. Zelek
dcterms:description: A curated player identification dataset from baseball videos, built based on the baseball 3D pose dataset. The dataset comprises 150 player tracklets sampled from over 1000 videos, with jersey number labels assigned to each tracklet.
dcterms:title: Baseball Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Vats
W. J. McNally
P. Walters
D. A. Clausi
J. S. Zelek
dcterms:description: The Ice Hockey dataset consists of 3510 player tracklets generated from 84 NHL videos, focusing on player identification in a fast-paced game with high motion blur and heavy equipment.
dcterms:title: Ice Hockey Dataset
